XMLDB.COMMENT: XMLDB file for the Moodle Developers plugin

TABLE.NAME: dev
TABLE.COMMENT: Default comment for dev, please edit me

FIELD.NAME: firstname
FIELD.COMMENT: The firstname

FIELD.NAME: email
FIELD.COMMENT: The primary email, used form gravatar integration

FIELD.NAME: moodleorgid
FIELD.COMMENT: The user's ID at moodle.org, if known

FIELD.NAME: trackerid
FIELD.COMMENT: The username of the person in the JIRA tracker

TABLE.NAME: dev_person_aliases
TABLE.COMMENT: Lists all aliases the given person uses

FIELD.NAME: fullname
FIELD.COMMENT: The name used by the given developer

FIELD.NAME: email
FIELD.COMMENT: The email used by the given developer

FIELD.NAME: personid
FIELD.COMMENT: The ID of the user from the persons table

FIELD.NAME: repository
FIELD.COMMENT: The name of the repository this commit comes from

FIELD.NAME: commithash
FIELD.COMMENT: SHA hash of the commit object

FIELD.NAME: authordate
FIELD.COMMENT: The timestamp of the commit authorship

FIELD.NAME: authorname
FIELD.COMMENT: The commit's author name as recorded in the commit

FIELD.NAME: authoremail
FIELD.COMMENT: The commit author's email as recorded in the commit object

FIELD.NAME: personid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the author in the dev_persons table, if known

FIELD.NAME: subject
FIELD.COMMENT: The commit message subject

FIELD.NAME: merge
FIELD.COMMENT: Is the commit a merge commit or not

FIELD.NAME: issue
FIELD.COMMENT: The tracker issue key this commit is associated with

FIELD.NAME: tag
FIELD.COMMENT: The most recent git tag containing this commit

TABLE.NAME: dev_git_commit_branches
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores the information about branches that contain a given commit

FIELD.NAME: commitid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the commit record

FIELD.NAME: branch
FIELD.COMMENT: The name of the Git branch containng the given commit

TABLE.NAME: dev_tracker_activities
TABLE.COMMENT: The activity stream items from the Moodle tracker

FIELD.NAME: uuid
FIELD.COMMENT: The universally unique identifier as provided by the activity stream

FIELD.NAME: title
FIELD.COMMENT: The activity title

FIELD.NAME: personid
FIELD.COMMENT: The ID of the activity author from the persons table, if known

FIELD.NAME: personfullname
FIELD.COMMENT: Full name

FIELD.NAME: personlink
FIELD.COMMENT: The URL to see the user's profile

FIELD.NAME: personemail
FIELD.COMMENT: The email of the user as reported by the stream

FIELD.NAME: category
FIELD.COMMENT: The category of the activity, if reported by the stream

FIELD.NAME: link
FIELD.COMMENT: The URL to the activity

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: When did the activity happened
